QuestData.Title: Marking the Fallen
QuestData.Description: Many warriors have met death to bring us victory, $n. The fate of a true orc.$B$BI have seen the way the Alliance loots the bodies of our fallen, clutching at our goods like packrats. They will not defile our fallen heroes on this field.$B$BTake these wards with you to the Bloodmire. Place them on the bodies of our fallen warriors. I will be watching, to see how many have fallen, and to honor their sacrifice. Let us hope the spirits give us aid for our respect.
QuestData.LogDescription: Use the Banner of the Fallen to mark 7 Fallen Stonard Warriors.
QuestData.CompletionText: The spirits will watch over us, $n.
QuestData.RewardText: You honor both the dead and the living with your courage, $n.
